modName: Papyrus Syntax Highlight XML generator for notepad plusplus
summary: Papyrus Syntax Highlight XML generator for notepad++
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[b]Papyrus Syntax Highlight XML generator for [color=#FF6600]notepad++[/color][/b]
[line]
You can edit psc files on notepad++ with syntax highliting latest SKSE, 
SkyUI MCM APIs, even if any your favorite Framework!

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/39361-1-1375359409.jpg [/img]

[url=http://www.creationkit.com/Notepad%2B%2B_Setup]Notepad++ Setup page[/url] on creationkit.com was great helpful for me.
But now syntax hightlighting xml is a little bit old. So I made this tool.
This tool has only 2 buttons, but these 2 can make world colorful.

[line]
[b][[color=#FF6600]How to Use[/color]][/b]
[line]
[img=center] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/39361-2-1375359409.jpg [/img]

[color=#FF6600]1[/color]. Create \"New Folder\" somewhere you like. (Desktop is good choice)

[color=#FF6600]2[/color]. copy all psc files from SKSE to the new folder.
(option): copy all psc files from SkyUI MCM to the new folder.
(option): copy all psc files from your favorite Framework if you have it.

[color=#FF6600]3[/color]. Startup tool with double click.

[color=#FF6600]4[/color]. push [[color=#FF6600]...[/color]] button and select folder you created on step 1.

[color=#FF6600]5[/color]. push [[color=#FF6600]generate[/color]] and wait 1 sec.

[color=#FF6600]6[/color]. \"userDefineLang.xml\" is generated to the tool\'s folder. then place 
   \"userDefineLang.xml\" to the same folder notepad++.exe exists.

That\'s [color=#FF6600]all[/color] !

[[color=#FF6600]version 2.0[/color]]
[color=#FF6600]7[/color]. Added \"lazy\" [color=#FF6600]AutoComplete[/color] XML generation feature.
   copy \"Papyrus.xml\" to Notepad++/plugins/APIs/

[line]
[Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable Package]
[url=http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=5555]http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=5555[/url]

[Microsoft .NET Framework 4]
[url=http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718]http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718[/url]
[line]
author: eins
